{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.04996v1", "title": "Laplacian eigenvalues for large negative Robin parameters on domains
  with outward peaks", "summary": "We study the asymptotic behavior of individual eigenvalues of the Laplacian
in domains with outward peaks for large negative Robin parameters. A large
class of cross-sections is allowed, and the resulting asymptotic expansions
reflect both the sharpness of the peak and the geometric shape of its
cross-section. The results are an extension of previous works dealing with
peaks whose cross-sections are balls.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP,math.SP", "published": "2025-04-07T12:24:29Z"}
